main_TAB_noMostrarMas: Do not show this message again
parametros_LBL_descripcion: Application parameters configuration. Changes in these values ​​do not imply a recalculation of the entire set, it is necessary to return to the Location tab and recalculate.
conversionAreakWp_LBL: kWp that can be installed per square meter available
conversionAreakWp_TT: This value will be used to know how many KWP can be installed in a defined area. KWP maximum = area in square meters / this parameter
IVAenergia_TT: The VAT that is impact on electricity spending
IVAinstalacion_TT: The VAT that is impact on the amount to which the installation ascends
perdidasSistema_TT: The losses of the photovoltaic system due to the deterioration of some components, adverse conditions, poor investors, etc.
interesVAN_TT: Discount rate to apply in the calculation of the net current value
potenciaPanelInicio_TT: KWP power of the initial panel used in calculations
tecnologia_TT:
You can choose three types of panels to perform the estimates: 
- those that have crystalline silicon cells 
- Modules of thin copper and Indian seleniuro lamina (CuInSe) or copper, Indian and Gallic seleniuro (CuInGaSe) 
- Thin Cadmium Teluro (CdTe) 
- unknown. 
If one of the first three options is chosen, in the calculation of photovoltaic production, the temperature effect will be taken into account. If the other option (unknown) is chosen, in the calculation some power losses will be assumed due to the temperature effect of 8% (generic value that is considered reasonable for temperate climates). The effect of the spectral distribution of irradiance received on production can only be calculated for crystalline and CDTE silicon technologies.
ficheroTarifas_TT: The user can customize a file with different prices while complying with the format given in the example
contacto_LBL_descripcion: Send us your comments. We will try to attend you as soon as possible
contacto_LBL_advertencia: The data that contributes to this form will be used solely and exclusively to answer your application and will not be stored in any file or used for any other purpose
contacto_LBL_respuesta: Mark here if you agree to receive answers
ayuda_TIT_localizacion: Geographical location data are identified in this tab
ayuda_TIT_consumos: In this tab, data and consumption data are identified before installation
ayuda_TIT_resultados: This tab shows the energetic balance resulting from the installation of the panels
ayuda_TIT_precios: This tab shows the economic-financial balance
ayuda_TIT_graficos: In this tab some reference graphics are shown
nombreProyecto_TT: Name that the user gives to this simulation (eg. apartment01, luzescalera01, garage00…)
importarProyecto_TT: Select file *.solimp previously exported by Solidar
importarProyecto_MSG_confirmaReemplazo: The existing project will be replaced by the imported
posicionLonLat_TT: It is not necessary to fill this field, it is only used to focus the map on these coordinates
localizacion_TT: After indicating city and direction where the panels will be installed Pulse ‘intro'
candidatos_TT: Select the correct direction or sign up on the lower map with a double mouse pulsation
botonPuntoConsumo_TT: Button to create a new consumption point
botonBaseSolar_TT: Button to create a new base to install panels
botonDeshacer_TT: Allows to cancel the last vertex created
botonTipoMapa_TT: Allows to exchange between Sátelite or Map
botonShadow_TT: Abre ventana de Google Shadow centrada en este mapa
mapa_MSG_definePuntoConsumo: You must define at least one consumption point on the map before continuing
mapa_MSG_defineBase: You must define at least one base on the map before continuing
mapa_MSG_cuantosPuntoConsumo:
In {{modoActivo}} mode there can be no more than one consumption point 
 nmust delete the existing one before coninuin
mapa_MSG_Polygon: Define the area in which the panels will be installed. Only three points are necessary. You can define the azimuth for each of them using the icon
mapa_MSG_LineString: Point on map to indicate the geographical orientation of the panels
mapa_MSG_posicionConsumo: A click to position a new consumption point
mapa_MSG_territorio: The application is only valid for Spain
mapa_MSG_insular: Be careful, you are in non -peninsular territory. 3.0TD rates can be wrong (Please review).
nombreBaseSolar_TT: Identify the name of this basis for future references
areaMapa_TT: Surface measured on the map in square meters
inclinacionTejado_TT: Roof inclination, measured with respect to the horizontal of the land, on which the panels will be mounted
areaReal_TT: Real area available corrected by the roof inclination
potenciaMaxima_TT: It is the maximum kWp to be installed in this base depending on the available area (see conversion parameter)
inclinacionPaneles_TT: Degrees of inclination (between 0 and 90) on the roof that the panels will have. If ‘optimal’ is marked, no value is necessary
inclinacionOptima_TT: Mark this field if you want the system to calculate the optimal value of the inclination of the panels
inAcimut_TT: The angle between the south with the horizontal projection of the sun. If the panels were oriented to the south, the azimuth will be 0º, made the east, -90º and west 90º. This field is filled by indicating on the map the orientation that the panels will have. If it is not completed it is assumed that it is 0
angulosOptimos_TT: Mark this field if you want the system to calculate the optimal value of inclination and azimut
nombrePuntoConsumo_TT: Identify the name of this point of consumption for future reference
rendimiento_MSG_errorFetch: Error running fetch in PVGIS. Answer:
botonNuevoTipoConsumo_TT: Button to create new consumption type
nombreTipoConsumo_TT: Identize the name of this consumption for future references
fuente_TT: Select the source type from which the consumption profile will be loaded
consumoAnualREE_TT: In case of opting for the REE type profile, the estimated annual consumption must be indicated
nombreFicheroCSV_TT: Identify the Consumption file downloaded from your distribution company
cTotalAnual_TT: Annual energy consumption of this profile
nombreTarifa_TT: The type of rate hired with the marketing company
botonMuestraMapaTipoConsumo_TT: Shows consumption graph of selected consumption type
consumo_MSG_descripcionFuentes:
There are three ways to provide the information of the consumption profile
  • CSV: a file with values separated by semicolons obtained from the website of your distribution company. See instructions here
  • REE: using the REE standard profile according to final consumption profiles based on the initial profiles based on the real demand of the system and the estimated annual consumption of the installation
  • DATADIS: a file obtained from the platform of the distribution companies called DATADIS

    • You must choose one or the other according to the information you have.
consumo_MSG_numeroLimitadoRegistros: Notice: there are only {{registros}} records that do not complete one year of statistics
consumo_MSG_alMenosUnTipoConsumo: Must define at least one consumption type
consumo_MSG_definirFicheroConsumo: You must define the consumption file before continuing
consumo_MSG_definirPotenciaBaseREE: Must define an annual base consumption greater than 0 for the REE profile
consumo_TT_descripcionTarifaP1: P1 rate or tip (the most expensive in 2.0TD)
consumo_TT_descripcionTarifaP2: P2 rate or valley (the intermediate in 2.0TD)
consumo_TT_descripcionTarifaP3: P3 rate or llano (the cheapest in 2.0TD)
consumo_TT_valorTarifa: Indicate the price in euros without VAT of this rate
consumo_TT_valorCompensa: Indicate the price in euros without VAT with which the electricity company pays the electricity not consumed
precioInstalacion_TT:
Despite trying to keep prices updated, this amount should be considered as a provisional guideline on the project that an installer can formulate (especially if he has more information about the final location).
Some expenses are not included here: civil works ( if necessary), replacement of insulation or old tiles on the roof, lifting means if necessary, modifications that the distributor or the Administration may require of the installation and some taxes and fees that the city council may collect (ICIO or building license )
correccionPrecioInstalacion_TT:
While we try to use updated prices, the user can alter the estimation given with the value you define here.
Indicate the percentage you want to increase (positive value) or decrease (negative value) the price of installation according to your particular conditions
precioInstalacionCorregido_TT: Price of the installation corrected by the indicated correction factor
botonInfoBase_TT: Detailed information of the selected base
potenciaUnitaria_TT: Unit power in kWp of the installed panels
paneles_TT: Recommended number of panels to be installed in this base. Can be modified
cMaximoAnual_TT: Maximum electricity consumption in an hour
potenciaTotal_TT: Maximum power available in this base
deficitAnual_TT: Electricity that is still necessary to buy from the network after the photovoltaic installation
excedenteAnual_TT: Energy poured into the grid when production is higher than consumption
energiaFaltante%Consumo_TT: The percentage of the electricity bought with respect to total consumption
energiaSobrante%Produccion_TT: The percentage of excess electricity compared to the produced
Consumo%Produccion_LBL: Percentage of consumption with respect to production
Consumo%Produccion_TT: Percentage of consumption with respect to production. To be able to opt for the subsidy of the Next Generation funds, this percentage must always be exceeding 80%
Produccion%Consumo_TT: Percentage of photovoltaic energy produced with respect to the consumption
autoconsumoMedioAnual_TT: Average percentage of photovoltaic energy consumed per year (not always consumes all).
autosuficienciaMediaAnual_TT: Average percentage of energy consumed from solar panels. It is a measure of independence regarding the electricity grid
autosuficienciaMaxima_TT: The maximum self -sufficiency that could be achieved if all the photovoltaic surplus could be consumed (either with batteries and/or changing consumption habits).
kgCO2AnualRenovable_LBL: kg of CO2 saved per year if renewable source
kgCO2AnualRenovable_TT: CO2 (kg) not expelled to the atmosphere if the origin of energy were peninsular and renewable. It can be modified in the parameter window.
kgCO2AnualNoRenovable_LBL: Kg of CO2 per year saved if non -renewable source
kgCO2AnualNoRenovable_TT: CO2 (kg) not expelled to the atmosphere if the origin of energy were peninsular and non -renewable. It can be modified in the parameter window.
resultados_MSG_excesoPotencia: There is an excess of power in this base based on the available area
previo_TT: Pending amortization amount  at the beginning of the period
inversion_TT: The amount invested during the period
pendiente_TT: Pending amortization at the end of the period
gastoSinPlacasAnual_TT: Annual electricity expenditure without solar panels. Only the variable part of the invoice is taken into account
gastoConPlacasAnual_TT: The estimated annual expenditure on electricity with solar panels. Only the variable part of the invoice is taken into account
ahorroAnual_TT: Annual spending difference in electricity with and without solar panels
ahorroAnualPorciento_TT: Annual savings in relation to the original expense
noCompensadoAnual_TT:
The amount of surplus energy that the electricity company will not compensate.
 The Law (RD 244/2019) does not allow the consumer to pay any amount when the balance between the cost of the excess energy and that of the consumed of any day will be favorable to the consumer.
 It usually happens when more panels are installed than the advisable ones, when consumed well below the usual (on vacation) or when the compensation price of the company is high (very unlikely).
valorSubvencionIBI_TT:
Fill if the municipality where the installation is carried out bonuses the real estate tax.
The Fundación Renovables facilitates a list of municipalities with bonuses in the IBI and ICO reductions.
porcientoSubvencionIBI_TT: The percentage with the City Council bonuses the amount of the IBI
tiempoSubvencionIBI_TT: The number of years during which the bonus can be applied in the IBI
tipoSubvencionEU_TT: If the Next Generation funding subsidy were to be applied for, indicate if the installation was collective (a community of owners, for example) or individual. The subsidy will not be granted if the energy generated per year exceeds 80% of the energy consumed annually.
graficos_LBL_produccionMediaMensual: Monthly average production with {{potencia}} installed / average monthly consumption
informe_LBL_disclaimer1: All given estimates have been made as accurate as possible, with the best intention and without any commitment. estimated installation. There is high volatility in this factor and we cannot guarantee that it reflects the reality of the market at every moment and territory, so we have included a field that allows you to correct that price according to the recommendations of your installer.
informe_LBL_disclaimer1pdf: All given estimates have been made as accurate as possible, with the best intention and without any commitment. Special mention we must do regarding the estimated price of the installation. There is a high volatility in this factor and we cannot guarantee that it reflects the reality of the market at every moment and territory, so we have included a field that allows you to correct that price according to the recommendations of your installer. SOM Energia has no economic interest Neither direct nor indirect in this study except contributing to a fair energy transition with users, efficient, decentralized and clean.
informe_LBL_disclaimer2: Som Energia has no economic or direct interest in this study except contributing to a fair energy transition with users, efficient, decentralized and clean.
informe_MSG_procesarPrimero: You must obtain the energy balance before you can generate the report
nominatim_MSG_errorBuscandoTerritorio: Nominatim error looking for territory status: {{resp}}}
